H0.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. 5 countries

H1.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. 8 countries

H2.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. 3 countries

H3.text: How many countries border the Sargasso Sea. None

A4.text: It is the only named sea without land boundaries.

A5.text: The Sargasso Sea is bordered by oceanic currents, not by landmasses.
